General.Name: Zhongmin Energy Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Zhongmin Energy Co., Ltd. focuses on the development and construction of power generation projects in China. It generates electricity from wind, solar, and biomass energy. The company was formerly known as Nanzhi Co Ltd. and changed its name to Zhongmin Energy Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Zhongmin Energy Co., Ltd. is based in Fuzhou, China. Zhongmin Energy Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Fujian Investment & Development Group Co.,Ltd.
